StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetDcMadesByRecruiter]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Recrui.ngPersonId uniqueiden..er = null, @RssOrgId int = null AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @dcMade INT SET @dcMade = 20
CREATE TABLE #Recrui.ngPerson ( rowguid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,RANK_CODE VARCHAR(10) ,RecruiterLastName VARCHAR(20) ,RecruiterFirstName VARCHAR(20) ,RecruiterMiddleName VARCHAR(20) )
IF @RssOrgId IS NOT NULL BEGIN INSERT INTO #Recrui.ngPerson SELECT rp.rowguid, rp.RANK_CODE, p.LAST_NAME as RecruiterLastName, p.FIRST_NAME as RecruiterFirstName, p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME as RecruiterMiddleName FROM MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON rp INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Person p ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = p.PERSON_ID WHERE RP.ORGANIZATION_ID = @RssOrgId END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO #Recrui.ngPerson SELECT rp.rowguid, rp.RANK_CODE, p.LAST_NAME as RecruiterLastName, p.FIRST_NAME as RecruiterFirstName, p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME as RecruiterMiddleName FROM MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON rp INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Person p ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = p.PERSON_ID WHERE rp.rowguid = @Recrui.ngPersonId END
SELECT p.ProspectId ,per.LastName ,per.FirstName ,per.Gender ,pp.PhoneNumber ,CASE WHEN p.NwaId IS NULL THEN 'Prospect' ELSE ( SELECT [STATUS_DESCRIPTION] FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA n INNER JOIN MCRISS.[dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] cs ON n.NWA_ID = cs.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.[dbo].[STATUS_DISPOSITION] sd ON cs.[STATUS_TYPE] = sd.[STATUS_TYPE] AND cs.[STATUS_CODE] = sd.[STATUS_CODE] AND cs.[DISPOSITION_CODE] = sd.[DISPOSITION_CODE] WHERE n.rowguid = p.NwaId AND cs.[CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID] = (SELECT MAX([CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID]) FROM MCRISS.[dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] WHERE NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID) ) END AS Status ,pd.ProspectDisposi.onType ,p.Source ,pac.Ac.vity ,pe.EmailAddress ,rp.RANK_CODE ,rp.RecruiterLastName ,rp.RecruiterFirstName ,rp.RecruiterMiddleName ,pc.ProspectDate ,pc.ProspectCommentId FROM USMC.ProspectComment pc INNER JOIN Prospect p ON p.ProspectId = pc.ProspectId INNER JOIN Person per ON per.PersonId = p.PersonId LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.PersonPhone pp ON pp.PersonId = per.PersonId LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.PersonEmail pe ON pe.PersonId = per.PersonId INNER JOIN #Recrui.ngPerson rp on pc.Recrui.ngPersonId = rp.rowguid LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.ProspectDisposi.on pd on pd.ProspectDisposi.onId = p.ProspectDisposi.onId INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment pac on pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId WHERE pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = @dcMade AND (pp.PersonPhoneTypeId = 1 OR pp.PersonPhoneTypeId is null) AND (pe.PersonEmailTypeId = 1 OR pe.PersonEmailTypeId is null) Order BY PC.ProspectDate DESC
DROP TABLE #Recrui.ngPerson
END
